document.full_text: bahraini shi'ite clerics accused police on tuesday of violating religious freedoms by breaking up street festivals by majority shi'ites that police said activists had turned into political protests against the government.
document.title: bahraini clerics accuse police of violating religious freedoms
lines_and_colors: bahraini shi'ite clerics accused police on tuesday of violating religious freedoms by breaking up street festivals by majority shi'ites that police said activists had turned into political protests against the government.
